class.name: AchievementQuery
class.description: The AchievementQuery class allows constructing queries for fetching achievements from the Torii indexer, supporting filtering by hidden status, namespaces, and world addresses.

method.name: hidden
method.description: Sets whether to include hidden achievements in the query.

method.name: namespaces
method.description: Sets the namespaces to filter by.

method.name: world_addresses
method.description: Sets the world addresses to filter by.
